website_summaries.verdict: The RTA2600 is a solid router that excels with multiple connected devices, but its competitors are faster and less expensive.
pros: The Amped Wireless RTA2600 Athena High Power Wi-Fi router delivers solid performance, especially when multiple devices using various Wi-Fi technologies are connected
It's also compact and easy to use
cons: The RTA2600 has less features and slower performance than its competitors and is more expensive
Its storage feature doesn't support media streaming or Time Machine backup for Macs

website_summaries.verdict: The Amped Wireless Athena High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Router RTA2600 is one of the few routers out there that supports the latest MU-MIMO technology. It delivered fast 5GHz throughput in testing, but its range performance could be better.
pros: Uses new multi-user, multiple-in, multiple-out technology
cons: Middling performance in our tests over long distances
Slow storage-file transfer speeds in our tests

customer_reviews.title: Defective routers being sold as NEW
customer_reviews.text: Amped rta2600 /ac2600 are being sold as new from a business called Copythat! when in fact this router was manufactured over two years ago BUT ONLY have 30 days return from copy that And 1 year from date of manufacture feomAMPED WIRELESS so in fact the warranty is USELESSS... and Amazon is complicit in this deception.....so DO NOT BUY from copythat! OR amped wireless.com The modem port is defective and will not hold any Ethernet connection securely in place which will result in intermittent connection issues. DONT TAKE MY WORD...just read all the bad reviews and you will see how bad they actually are! YOUVE BEEN WARNED....
customer_reviews.author: david neal

customer_reviews.title: The distance the wireless signal would reach is decent (not much better than my cheaper router)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router in hopes that it would reach areas in my house that our standard wireless router could not reach. The distance the wireless signal would reach is decent (not much better than my cheaper router). The BIGGEST issue is it constantly drops signal. You will need to reset the box frequently. Once reset the signal will last but then it will need to reset again just a few hours later! Returning today!
customer_reviews.author: Hope_Long

customer_reviews.title: Not for novices
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn with this product..... it took me forever to get it to work as a firmware update didn't work properly which sent me into support call hell... once i got it fixed and when it is up and running it works great.... but i do seem to have to restart/reboot it on occasion which is annoying as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Sad to say that it really didn't make any difference
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because I truly thought it would help with my internet service throughout my home. Sad to say that it really didn't make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: https: //www. amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in September 2017, and it now does not work. 6 months for a router of this price is unsatisfactory for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Definately not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. The Wireless-N signal degrades significantly over distance. The route has less coverage than the Amped Wireless AC1750.
customer_reviews.author: NBinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Has a simple user interface. What i am having issues with is - it does drop sessions from time to time, I've had to reboot it. Not what i expected I an expensive router.. On a positive note, the coverage seems to be pretty good. I have a 3500 sq ft home.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy24

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless router
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This is a great wireless router. It doesn't quite cover the way that it is advertised but it does have great range and speed. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Harry L. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well but I don't see huge range gain over previous stuff I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and connected all my devices without slowing down my connection speed
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong strong strong, this Router is everything it is described as.
customer_reviews.author: J Scott

customer_reviews.title: great through multiple walls and outside
customer_reviews.text: The standard cable providers modem with built in wi-fi coverage was poor, maybe 25 to 50 feet through walls in the house. Having dual channels and so many amplifires, the multi devices in our house can all receive a channel and not slow us down. On our acreage this output signal is received outside the house around our farm at least 150 feet or more with sufficient signal.
customer_reviews.author: @dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and so far we are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Grahm

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and especially technical support
customer_reviews.text: Great Product and especially technical support. I had issues with my Internet provider so I called Amped Support. Within 10mins they had it resolved and I was ready to go. Very patience and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: After a year, I can't connect to the network ...
customer_reviews.text: After a year, I can't connect to the network because it won't accept the password. A complete reset and firmware update didn't help. One doesn't have time to deal with this issue that no other rouse seems to have. Customer support was unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: KingTutNYC

customer_reviews.title: Good when works- I took a chance
customer_reviews.text: This Router is a great one when it works. However, I have had it for less than a year and the radio seems to have gone out. The best amped wireless support could do for me was have me send the broken one in and wait to get the new one in the mail after they recieve the old one. I also had to pay for shipping. They also rarely do firmware updates and seem to be a small company. I would stick with netgear or another big company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The thing is extremely good if you're directly beside it
customer_reviews.text: For two hundred bucks it really wasn't worth it. The thing is extremely good if you're directly beside it, but having my computer in the adjacent room and I'm only getting roughly .5 - 1.5 MB of speed out of the 100MB speed I pay for. For the time being I've switched back to LAN and will probably be getting rid of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Voracity

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and long range
customer_reviews.text: The router instructions for set up were easy to understand and follow. The range of the 2.4 Ghz channel exceeds that of two other high end routers we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you need a boost in WiFi signal
customer_reviews.text: Makes streaming and having a teenager more manageable in my house. Highly recommended if you need a boost in WiFi signal.
customer_reviews.author: sol

customer_reviews.title: Better than my last router but surprised that the coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: Better than my last router but surprised that the coverage area is best for a one story residence and not two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The specs would have you believe this thing is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The specs would have you believe this thing is the current king of routers. It is not. The Asus AC -87 kills this thing in terms of range! I have a spread out house and the amped router could not handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. NO better than a low cost Router. Being returned today.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff kates

customer_reviews.title: Great range. Gabriella with Amp Tech support helped with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great range. Gabriella with Amp Tech support helped with setup. Phone support was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Beast of a Router!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a solid router, way more power than the other AC3200 routers on the market without the issues. I was apprehensive at first, not knowing much about Amped products, but am very satisfied after running this in our household for the last week! By the way, this has the faster qualcomm duo core processor and ram! Look at the specs!
customer_reviews.author: Christofer Ward

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any better than that
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed for the right price. Can't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kenney

customer_reviews.title: 4 GHz is better than 5
customer_reviews.text: Range of product is not grade. 2.4 GHz is better than 5.0
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marczyk

customer_reviews.title: OK product at a terrible price.
customer_reviews.text: Its an OK product at a terrible price. Even though I get Great wired and 5Ghz speed and performance. and it has Lots of features. The 2.4Ghz constantly drops out on both my laptops in different parts of my house- im only 10 feet away and I only get a range between 72-144MB/s. The wifi range for both 2.4ghz and 5ghz is also terrible. At this price range go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Newman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: The most expensive, and worst, wireless router I have ever owned. Worst setup interface. Hangs, glitchy, slow, infinite loops initial setup. No firmware updates. The worst logging,,, doesn't work. The range is unimpressive. The worst throughput. Constantly drops connection/disappears, have to re-sign in (after you realize you've all been on LTE for a day) Password must be entered repeatedly, finally after 3 - 5 entries it will connect. Every minor change requires restart, which is slow, minute. Go with a brand name you recognize. Lynksys, D-link, Netgear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, does not extend if you already have an AC router.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me to increase the signal. As per instructions, the extender needs to be close enough for a 70% signal to broadcast an extended signal. However, I have a newer ac router from Comcast Xfinity which has great coverage already. To get a stable signal for the extender to work, I could only place the extender 50 feet from my router. At 200 ft away from the extender, which is 250ft away from my router, the extender and router have the same signal strength from 2.4 and 5 networks. Also, the download and uploads speeds where actually better from my router, even though it was further away than the extender.
customer_reviews.author: regular joe

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Router and Best Support
customer_reviews.text: I needed to re set my router and Sergo was so patient with me got it re set , then my thermostat would not work Honeywell was no help support was in India so I called back and Sergo walked me through the router to make sure it got connection,it worked perfectly. The best company to purchase your router from and support is amazing. Grant
customer_reviews.author: GB 81 Glendale

customer_reviews.title: ... get my windows 7 laptop online and she was great. I'm a little disappointed with the range of ...
customer_reviews.text: Krista helped me get my windows 7 laptop online and she was great. I'm a little disappointed with the range of the router. I was expecting it to go to the backyard, which is about 50 feet from where the router is located, and the signal is only fair to poor out there.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Unstable and drops connections all the time
customer_reviews.text: Fast when it works, but as other reviews confirm, it drops connections all the time (reboots itself, and so you are without wireless at unpredictable times for up to 5 minutes). Very unstable, and has been since day one, even with firmware updates. I use the wireless for work at home, so this is a deal-breaker. Replacing after just 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome range and love the parental controls
customer_reviews.text: Finally a device that we can use in my home that will allow my son to use his xBox One in a room other than the family room. This router was a bit complicated for my non computer savvy self to set up but my teenager had no issues. There are no more dead spots throughout my house and it extends well beyond the perimeter of my property enabling us to use our wi-fi even outside in the backyard. The parental controls are awesome for me to block the use from my vampiress teenage daughter who has been known to sneak on in the middle of the night with the old router.
customer_reviews.author: Prism

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for low latency requirement when there are too many devices
customer_reviews.text: This wireless router is a work horse. When our household of devices (10-15 connected, 2-3 streaming, 1 gaming, all at once) got to be too much for our standard dual band, I gave this a shot. It solved the problem. It's basically 4 wireless routers in one. A bit pricey, but worth it in my opinion for the headaches it has resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff (Laluna)

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit , Great tech support .
customer_reviews.text: I have this unit and am very satisfied. Range is great , powerful. I needed to upgrade the software via the Amped web site downloads section for this router. I was getting intermittent dropped internet signals. Some ISP modems, don't play well with others. So I down loaded the bin file, went to dashboard and upgrade the firmware. Technology is ever changing , Amped supplies the upgrade , After the upgrade its perfect, Everything needs maintenance, The Amped support is amazing , Great product !
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: To out it succinctly this router is simply awesome and the very best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Decided to post a review after reading some of the negative reviews which I find not particularly credible or written by folks who know little about setting up a router. This router is awesome by any measure and better than router at twice it price. The only other router I would consider would be a Linksys WRT class router such as 1900ACS if the price were discounted by 50%. For this money this is the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: George Soto

customer_reviews.title: This router randomly locks up and my Samsung TV will ...
customer_reviews.text: This router randomly locks up and my Samsung TV will not connect to this router, wired or wirelessly. There has not been a firmware update for this router since 2015. Stay away from this device.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: stay away from RTA2600 or AC2600
customer_reviews.text: Router is glitches and locks up it does not keep correct time customer service is not helpful do not buy Amped products you will regret it i certainly wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless external hard drive support
customer_reviews.text: State-of-art coverage. Useless external hard drive support. Does not support current external hard drive sizes. If you need the hard drive feature forget this router.
customer_reviews.author: NITRAM

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival, I should send Amped Wireless a bill for my wasted time.
customer_reviews.text: Router was easy to connect to following the instructions, but would not stay connected to the internet, it would drop and stay offline for 20-30 seconds at a time and reconnect and repeat, updated firmware, changed cables, used basic setup, called the cable company, called Amped Tech Support waited an hour and no one ever came on the line, the recording offered to take a voice mail and suggested I go online for support, which I thought was funny because the device I wanted to use was not working, then I said ok, i plugged in my old router and it worked great soooooo, I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa

customer_reviews.title: Watch and wait
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to say that this is ... okay. Installation and set-up was pretty easy. I connected all my devices to the router rather than the home wireless network and that wasn't a big deal either. However, I'm not noticing tons of improvement. Maybe I have lead-lined walls in my old house. The smart TV 3 rooms away streams about the same as it did before with the occasional freeze-up. Kindle Fires work great, Iphone, not much difference. This will be a watch and wait for me.
customer_reviews.author: DonMac

product_meta.title: Amped Wireless ATHENA, High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Router with MU-MIMO (RTA2600)
product_meta.description:
The ATHENA is the ultimate router for the multi-device household. Built with a 1.4GHz Qualcomm Dual Core Processor, 16 high power amplifiers, and 4 high gain antennas, the ATHENA delivers unmatched Wi-Fi performance. It is equipped to provide unprecedented coverage, speed, and reliability for the most demanding networks with many connected devices. Extremely fast AC2600 Wi-Fi technology provides up to 2.53Gbps, making lag and buffering a thing of the past for everyone. The ATHENA also features cutting edge MU-MIMO technology that enables multiple devices to receive data at once, granting uninterrupted streaming for all. Upgrade your network with the ATHENA router today for the ultimate Wi-Fi experience.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: High Power Wi-Fi delivers whole home coverage with 16 powerful amplifiers and 4 high gain antennas
Unmatched AC2600 Wi-Fi Speeds for up to 2.53Gbps, 2.4GHz 800Mbps + 5GHz 1733Mbps
Multi User MIMO delivers data to multiple devices at once for better performance and up to 3x more speed
Game without lag and stream HD and 4K media to multiple devices at once without buffering
1.4GHz dual core Qualcomm Processor and 4 simultaneous Wi-Fi streams handle heavy traffic with ease
Advanced security features like coverage control, website blocking and SPI Firewall
File sharing with a USB 3.0 and a USB 2.0 port, as well as 4 additional Gigabit ports for network devices
Elite Support: Amped Wireless' free, US based, in-house, technical support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars76 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
